com.sk89q.worldedit.regions.selector

Class Polygonal2DRegionSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sk89q.worldedit.regions.Polygonal2DRegionSelector
      • com.sk89q.worldedit.regions.selector.Polygonal2DRegionSelector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CUIRegion, RegionSelector

    public class Polygonal2DRegionSelector
extends Polygonal2DRegionSelector
implements RegionSelector, CUIRegion
    Creates a Polygonal2DRegion from a user's selections.
